error.general: Something unexpected happened, sorry about that! %@

network.unkown: We’re sorry, an unknown server problem has occurred. Please try again later.
network.connection: It looks like you may have lost Internet connection. Please check your settings and try again.
network.slow: This is taking a little longer than expected. Please wait…
network.timeout: It looks like you may be experiencing a slow Internet connection. Please try again later.

email.format: The email addres you entered does not appear to be valid.
email.taken: The email you entered has already been registered.

password.minLength: Your password must be at least %@ characters.

passwordAgain.mismatch: Your passwords do not match. Please re-enter both.

format.title: Invalid Email
format.body: The format of the email addres you entered does not appear to be correct.

missing.title: Specify a Password
missing.body: Please enter a password you would like to use.

confirm.title: Confirm Password
confirm.body: Please re-type your password to confirm.

match.title: Password Confirmation
match.body: The confirmation password you entered does not match. Please re-enter both.

invalid.title: Username Taken
invalid.body: A user with that email has already been registered.

error.email: Please enter the email you used when you registered.
error.password: Please enter the password you selected when you registered.
error.invalid: Please check your email and password and try again.
